segments.text: My brother gave me a baby cat yesterday . I can keep it as my pet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t understand . Why do you want a cat ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cats are beautiful and lovely , aren ’ t they ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , cats are too dirty . They are lazy and cunning . I don ’ t like them at all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t think so . I think cats are sweet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can keep the cat , but you should keep it away from me .
segments.speaker: S2
